result.markdown:
---
title: "In-Class Exercise 07: Calibrating Hedonic Pricing Model for Private Highrise Property with GWR Method"
author: "Pelle Knegjes"
format: html
editor: visual
date: "Okt 14 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute: 
  eval: true
  echo: true
  message: false
  freeze: true
---


*LESSON NOTE*

To turn multi into single poly

TMSHAPE

sf_polygon = prov_sf

st(cast (polygon

mutate area = st_area(.))

prov_vleaned = sfpolygon

groupby province

filter area == max(area

ungroup()

select(-area)

select(province)

---------


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(olsrr, corrplot, performance, ggpubr, sf, spdep, sfdep, GWmodel, tmap, tidyverse, glue, gtsummary, ggstatsplot)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\BlumeTechnologies\ISSS626\ISSS626\In-Class_Exercises\In-Class_Exersice07\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_svy21 <- st_transform(mpsz, 3414)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale = read_csv("data/aspatial/Condo_resale_2015.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 1436 Columns: 23
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","

ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(condo_resale)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Rows: 1,436
Columns: 23

```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale.sf <- st_as_sf(condo_resale,
                            coords = c("LONGITUDE", "LATITUDE"),
                            crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs=3414)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
corrplot(cor(condo_resale[, 5:23]), diag = FALSE, order = "AOE",
         tl.pos = "td", tl.cex = 0.5, method = "number", type = "upper")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcorrmat(condo_resale[, 5:23])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo.mlr <- lm(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE + 
                   PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE +
                   PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT  + PROX_PARK + 
                   PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL    + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                   NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD + LEASEHOLD_99YR,
                 data=condo_resale.sf)
ols_regress(condo.mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::
:::


EXCLUDE STATISTICLAYY INSIGNIFICANT IN RESUTLS\
Sign \<0.5

VIF between 0 and 5 no problem

above 5 meh

above 10 no go


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_vif_tol(condo.mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
              Variables Tolerance      VIF
1              AREA_SQM 0.8703348 1.148983

```


:::
:::


### variable selection


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_fw_mlr = ols_step_forward_p(
  condo.mlr,
  p_val = 0.05,
  details = FALSE
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(condo_fw_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcoefstats(condo.mlr,
            sort = "ascending")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Number of labels is greater than default palette color count.
• Select another color `palette` (and/or `package`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_fit(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_hist(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_test_normality(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in ks.test.default(y, "pnorm", mean(y), sd(y)): ties should not be
present for the one-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
-----------------------------------------------
       Test             Statistic       pvalue  
-----------------------------------------------
Shapiro-Wilk              0.6856         0.0000 
Kolmogorov-Smirnov        0.1366         0.0000 
Cramer-von Mises         121.0768        0.0000 
Anderson-Darling         67.9551         0.0000 
-----------------------------------------------
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mlr_output = as.data.frame(condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals)%>%
  rename('FW_MLR_RES' = 'condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf = cbind(condo_resale.sf,
                        mlr_output$FW_MLR_RES) %>%
  rename('MLR_RES' = 'mlr_output.FW_MLR_RES')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
tmap mode set to plotting
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE)
tm_shape(mpsz)+
  tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE) +
  tm_polygons(alpha = 0.4) +
  tm_shape(condo_resale_sf) +
  tm_dots(col = "MLR_RES",
          alpha = 0.6,
          style = "quantile")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: The shape mpsz is invalid. See sf::st_is_valid
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Variable(s) "MLR_RES" contains positive and negative values, so midpoint is set to 0. Set midpoint = NA to show the full spectrum of the color palette.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-Class_Exercise07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
tmap mode set to plotting
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf = condo_resale_sf %>%
  mutate(nb = st_knn(geometry, k=6,
                     longlat = FALSE),
         wt = st_weights(nb,
                         style = "W"),
         .before = 1)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_perm(condo_resale_sf$MLR_RES,
                  condo_resale_sf$nb,
                  condo_resale_sf$wt,
                  alternative = "two.sided",
                  nsim = 99)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Monte-Carlo simulation of Moran I

data:  x 
weights: listw  
number of simulations + 1: 100 

statistic = 0.32254, observed rank = 100, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: two.sided
```


:::
:::


Null hypothesis that its random is rejected so there is clustering


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_fixed = bw.gwr(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE + PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP + NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD,
                  data=condo_resale_sf,
                  approach = "CV",
                  kernel = "gaussian",
                  adaptive = FALSE,
                  longlat = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::
:::


use the bandwith in the calibration


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed = gwr.basic(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE + PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP + NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD,
                  data=condo_resale_sf,
                  bw=bw_fixed,
                  kernel = "gaussian",
                  longlat = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_adaptive <- bw.gwr(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE  + 
                        PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE    + 
                        PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + 
                        PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL   + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                        NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD, 
                      data=condo_resale_sf, 
                      approach="CV", 
                      kernel="gaussian", 
                      adaptive=TRUE, 
                      longlat=FALSE)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_adaptive <- gwr.basic(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE + 
                            PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + 
                            PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + 
                            PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                            NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD, 
                          data=condo_resale_sf, 
                          bw=bw_adaptive, 
                          kernel = 'gaussian', 
                          adaptive=TRUE, 
                          longlat = FALSE)
```
